issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
If the directory is nonexistent, getQuotaUsage rpc call will run into 

NullPointerException throwed by

FSDirStatAndListingOp.getQuotaUsageInt() .

I think FSDirStatAndListingOp.getQuotaUsageInt() should throw FileNotFoundException when the directory is nonexistent.
fields.summary: NameNode: Fix NullPointerException when getQuotaUsageInt() invoked

[~liuhongtong] Thank you, this really worth to fix as soon as possible.
BTW, you can assign this ticket to yourself.

[~liuhongtong] thanks for filing the jira and submitting the patch. patch looks good, mind adding a test case?
Thanks [~liuhongtong] for working on this. The fix LGTM. Agree with [~ajayydv] that we should add a unit test for this.
